name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.security.key.default.bitlength
description:
The length (bits) of keys we want the KeyProvider to produce. Key length
    defines the upper-bound on an algorithm's security, ideally, it would
    coincide with the lower-bound on an algorithm's security.

name: dfs.datanode.max.transfer.threads
description:
Specifies the maximum number of threads to use for transferring data
        in and out of the DN.

name: dfs.disk.balancer.plan.threshold.percent
description:
The percentage threshold value for volume Data Density in a plan.
      If the absolute value of volume Data Density which is out of
      threshold value in a node, it means that the volumes corresponding to
      the disks should do the balancing in the plan. The default value is 10.

name: dfs.datanode.max.nodes.to.report
description:
Number of nodes to include in JSON report. We will return nodes with
    the highest number of votes from peers.

name: dfs.qjournal.finalize-segment.timeout.ms
description:
Quorum timeout in milliseconds during finalizing for a specific
    segment.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.max.outstanding.paths
description:
Defines the maximum number of paths to satisfy that can be queued up in the
    Satisfier call queue in a period of time. Default value is 10000.

name: dfs.client.socketcache.expiryMsec
description: Socket cache expiration for short-circuit reads in msec.

name: dfs.qjournal.http.read.timeout.ms
description:
Timeout in milliseconds when reading from a HTTP connection from remote
    journals.

name: hadoop.zk.num-retries
description: Number of tries to connect to ZooKeeper.
